captions.text: l'm going to get a slice.

Let me tell you the story
of right hand<i>I</i>left hand.

lt's a tale
of good and evil.

lt was with this hand
that Cain iced his brother.

they go straight
to the soul of man.

The story of life
is this...

One hand is always
fighting the other hand,

and the left hand
is kicking much ass.

l mean, it looks like the right hand--
love-- is finished.

But hold on.
Stop the presses.

He got the left hand
on the ropes now.

lt's a devastating right,
and hate is hurt.

Left hand, hate,
K.O.'d by love.

lf l love you,
l love you.

There it is--
love and hate.

title: Do the Right Thing (6/10) Movie CLIP - LOVE and HATE (1989) HD
